item.title: Art Basel Qatar launches new fair format and appoints Wael Shawky as artistic director
item.description: Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet consectetur adipiscing elit. Quisque faucibus ex sapien vitae pellentesque sem placerat. In id cursus mi pretium tellus duis convallis.
